name: Afterlife: Dogs of Eden
description:
Afterlife: Dogs of Eden

Help Felix solve puzzles, reveal secrets, sneak past enemies and generally get out of this hell-hole called Heaven in this story driven 2D side-scroller adventure game with action elements! Expect humor, satire, breakage of the 4th wall, original characters and interesting world-building.

Afterlife: Dogs of Eden aims for curious players who want to discover new worlds, meet new characters and feel accomplished (and entertained) after completing silly little puzzles. Although peaceful zones may pique the interest, the danger zones will provide some exciting action.

The game provides a unique look at Heaven and the Garden of Eden; funny and why-the-hell-is-this-in-heaven experiences; puppies and overall great humor, sarcasm and design-centered breakage of the 4th wall. All packed into cute, colorful, lovely graphics.

Our main character Felix wakes up in Heaven not knowing how he got there. He’s greeted by an angel who offers him to look around and find a hobby he wants to do till the end of time. Unfortunately, none of the offers seem to be interesting so he wanders deeper until he gets to a forbidden place called the Garden of Eden - and there’s no way of getting out of there. How is he going to escape this place? Is there any way out of the boring Heaven? He will soon discover that Heaven is not only exceptionally boring but also there’s something weird, un-Heavenly happening. Reveal more about this strange place, its residents and how it’s run by interacting with the NPCs, inspecting objects, and listening to Felix’s snarky comments.

The Team (Desperatos)
 Game Designer: Lída Hrnčířová
 Artist: Lucie Gašparínová
 Programmer: Kourosh Riahidehkordi

Afterlife - Dogs of Eden is a 2D Adventure game created for the PC platform. it was created in one semester as part of the course computer games development at Charles university in Prague.
